web.name: Authentication
controls: Implement multi-factor authentication for all user accounts [mandatory]
Enforce strong password policies (min 12 chars, complexity) [mandatory]
Use secure session management with expiration [basic]
Implement account lockout after multiple failed attempts [basic]
Use OAuth 2.0 or OpenID Connect for third-party auth [advanced]
Secure session tokens with HttpOnly and Secure flags [mandatory]

web.name: Authorization
controls: Implement least privilege principle for all roles [mandatory]
Implement attribute-based access control (ABAC) where needed [advanced]
Enforce access control checks on every request [mandatory]
Protect against IDOR (Insecure Direct Object Reference) [mandatory]
Enforce location-based access controls where appropriate [optional]
Implement proper access control for APIs [basic]

mobile.name: Data Storage
controls: Use secure storage for sensitive data [mandatory]
Avoid storing sensitive data in plain text [basic]
Clear sensitive data from memory after use [advanced]

cloud.name: AWS Security
controls: Implement IAM roles and policies with least privilege [mandatory]
Enable CloudTrail logging for all regions [mandatory]
Use AWS Config for resource tracking [basic]
Encrypt S3 buckets and enable versioning [mandatory]
Use AWS KMS for encryption key management [advanced]
Enable multi-factor authentication for root account [mandatory]
Implement security groups and NACLs properly [basic]
Regularly rotate access keys and credentials [basic]

cert.name: CISSP
controls: Incident response and disaster recovery planning [basic]
